derivation: from an unused root meaning to sequester itself; fugitive;
outline:
Arad = "a wild ass"
  1. a Benjamite, son of Beriah, who drove out the inhabitants of Gath
  2. a royal city of the Canaanites north of the wilderness of Judah
strongs_def: Arad, the name of a place near Palestine, also of a Canaanite and an Israelite
